subheading.title: Limits
subheading.notes: Limits describe the behavior of a function as it approaches a specific point.

subheading.title: Derivatives
subheading.notes: Derivatives represent the rate of change of a function.

subheading.title: Integrals
subheading.notes: Integrals compute the area under a curve.

subheading.title: Differential Equations
subheading.notes: Equations involving derivatives of functions.

subheading.title: Laws of Motion
subheading.notes: Newton's laws describe the motion of objects under force.

subheading.title: Work and Energy
subheading.notes: Work-energy theorem relates work and kinetic energy.

subheading.title: Momentum
subheading.notes: Momentum is the product of mass and velocity.

subheading.title: Circular Motion
subheading.notes: Objects moving in circular paths experience centripetal force.

subheading.title: Hydrocarbons
subheading.notes: Hydrocarbons are compounds made of hydrogen and carbon.

subheading.title: Alkanes and Alkenes
subheading.notes: Alkanes are saturated, while alkenes have double bonds.

subheading.title: Isomerism
subheading.notes: Isomers have the same formula but different structures.

subheading.title: Aromatic Compounds
subheading.notes: Aromatic compounds contain benzene rings.

subheading.notes: Programming involves writing instructions for a computer.Lorem, ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. subheading.title: Variables and Data Types
subheading.notes: Variables store data of specific types.

subheading.title: Control Structures
subheading.notes: Control flow determines the execution order of statements.

subheading.title: Functions
subheading.notes: Functions group reusable code blocks.

subheading.title: Grammar
subheading.notes: Grammar includes sentence structure, tenses, and punctuation.

subheading.title: Reading Comprehension
subheading.notes: Reading comprehension involves understanding written texts.

subheading.title: Writing Skills
subheading.notes: Writing skills focus on formal and creative writing.

subheading.title: Vocabulary
subheading.notes: Vocabulary building enhances language proficiency.

subheading.title: Matrix Operations
subheading.notes: Matrix operations include addition, subtraction, and multiplication.

subheading.title: Determinants
subheading.notes: Determinants help in solving linear equations.

subheading.title: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors
subheading.notes: Eigenvalues and eigenvectors are used in dimensionality reduction.

subheading.title: Electric Fields
subheading.notes: Electric fields describe the force exerted by electric charges.

subheading.title: Magnetic Fields
subheading.notes: Magnetic fields describe the force exerted by moving charges.

subheading.title: Electromagnetic Waves
subheading.notes: Electromagnetic waves include light, radio waves, and X-rays.

subheading.title: Thermodynamics
subheading.notes: Thermodynamics deals with the relationship between heat and work.

subheading.title: Kinetics
subheading.notes: Kinetics studies the rates of chemical reactions.

subheading.title: Arrays
subheading.notes: Arrays store elements of the same type in contiguous memory.

subheading.title: Linked Lists
subheading.notes: Linked lists are data structures where each element points to the next.

subheading.title: Stacks and Queues
subheading.notes: Stacks and queues are linear data structures used for specific use cases.

subheading.title: Advanced Grammar
subheading.notes: Advanced grammar focuses on complex sentence structures.

subheading.title: Essay Writing
subheading.notes: Essay writing focuses on structure, clarity, and argumentation.

subheading.title: Public Speaking
subheading.notes: Public speaking skills include presentation and communication techniques.

subheading.title: Probability Theory
subheading.notes: Probability theory is used to model uncertain events.

subheading.title: Random Variables
subheading.notes: Random variables are used to represent uncertain quantities.

subheading.title: Wave-Particle Duality
subheading.notes: Wave-particle duality refers to the dual nature of particles and waves.

subheading.title: Quantum States
subheading.notes: Quantum states describe the properties of particles at small scales.

subheading.title: Periodic Table
subheading.notes: The periodic table organizes elements based on their atomic numbers.

subheading.title: Chemical Bonding
subheading.notes: Chemical bonding explains how atoms join to form molecules.

subheading.title: Sorting Algorithms
subheading.notes: Sorting algorithms arrange data in a specific order.

subheading.title: Searching Algorithms
subheading.notes: Searching algorithms are used to locate elements in data.
